Legend

Destiny Playbook

Everyone has heard of you. You're the legend! The hero! The one we're all looking up to! And we know you'll save the day, for sure!

Requirements

To become the Legend, you must have earned great renown.

The Legend starts with The Legend Begins.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-legend.Item.TQdioTq5EOhrhyqL]{The legend begins}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take a Custom Move from any Basic playbook.
  • Take a Legend Custom.
  • Take a Legend Custom.
  • Take a Legend Custom.
